title: Things My Grandmother Taught Me About Organized Living
description: Has chaos come to visit in your life? Do you feel stressed and overwhelmed by all of the small things you need to get done in a day? If so, "Things My Grandmother Taught Me About Organized Living" can help you get back on track. This short ebook shares some simple truths that will help you be a calmer person as you care for yourself, your environment and your belongings.
author: Gloria Barry
